definition: surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
Zouping county in Binzhou 濱州|滨州[Bin1 zhou1], Shandong
Zoucheng county level city in Jining 濟寧|济宁[Ji3 ning2], Shandong
Zoucheng county level city in Jining 濟寧|济宁[Ji3 ning2], Shandong
Zou Taofen (1895-1944), journalist, political theorist and publisher
Zouping county in Binzhou 濱州|滨州[Bin1 zhou1], Shandong
Zou Rong (1885-1905), a martyr of the anti-Qing revolution, died in jail in 1905
Zou Yan (305-240 BC), founder of the School of Yin-Yang of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
Tsou or Cou, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan

sentences.english: Let me introduce Prof. Zou to you.
sentences.chinese: 我來把鄒教授介紹給你們認識一下。

sentences.english: Zou Guojun were named outstanding experts of Yueyang City.
sentences.chinese: 鄒國軍等爲岳陽市優秀專家。

sentences.english: Drive body, Xing Zou, of the Tong wound.
Unique paper sculptures made by French graphic design studio Zim & Zou.
sentences.chinese: 由法國齊姆&鄒平面設計工作室設計的獨特的紙雕塑。

sentences.english: Brother Zou will be preaching next week.
sentences.chinese: 下主日鄒鎮民弟兄將傳講信息請代禱。

definition: Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
surname Jiang/refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
(classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
